name: Friend from Darkness
description:
Something is wrong, you lost control of your spaceship and want to get it back by hacking it's system.

Someone sent you message, you are gonna try to find out what is going on. But... Lights just went off and you no longer have control of the spaceship. So you start hacking spaceship system, but...

This game was made for Major Jam 4: Cosmic, it was my second Game Jam. The theme was cosmic and limitation the player must cheat. Game still has some small bugs, but I hope you will like it.

Everything in game (except Major Jam 4 logo) is created by me in limit of 72 hours.*

*With help of only voice actor

Problems and how to fix them:

  • I want to play in fullscreen - Click that almost invisible blue button in right down corner or download the game.
  • Interaction doesn't work - Look at the table and spam "E"
  • What to do in the minigame? - Rewrite numbers (0 and 1) include also ;

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
